list: You find a hole in the floor under the crate! All you can see is the faint glimmer of extremely far below.
You begin to lower yourself into the hole...
... and using your catlike agility land on all fours at the bottom of a large cavern!
This is a piece of map that you got from Wormbrain, the goblin thief. You will need to join it to the other two map pieces before you can see the route to Crandor.
This is a piece of map that you found Melzar's Maze. You will need to join it to the other two map pieces before you can see the route to Crandor.
This is a piece of map that you found in a secret chest in the Dwarven Mine. You will need to join it to the other two map pieces before you can see the route to Crandor.
You start the mediocre lengthed journey of clambering into the pipe...
You push your body down further into the pipe...
You see light from above, and start to climb upwards and out of the pipe system.
You scramble through the dark and dangerous tunnel...
You push yourself through countless jagged rocks...
You see bright torchlight on the other side...
